ModMetaData.name: Misc Building Changes Type B1
ModMetaData.author: Copper Boltwire
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0.0.0 For v1.1+
Type B 1: Increases Multi Analyzer, Vitals Monitor and Tool Cabinet effect TO 100%.
Using the patch system, ensures maximum compatibility with any other mods.
Load Order: Last - Just in case. (or first...)
Compatibility: 'should' not conflict with a darn thing... it's a patch mod. By loading it last, it ensures full compatibility.
Credits: Ogliss, from Rimworld Discord, gave me a helping hand to understand the patch system better - Thank you! Without him, this and the Tribal Headwear for Civilized worlds would not work.
